participant_abstract.sent: Meeting went very well again, al information was presented and a concepts were decided.
My information was concidered and affected the final outcome in a positive way.

Each of the other members contributed their information well and from the total bank of data we had aquired we made decisions to continue the project from a technologicaly innovative/fashion centred stance.

participant_actions.sent: 1.. The project manager , prepare his report, write minutes of meeting and prepare for next meeting.

2.. The industrial designer , design and make the actuly device from clay 3.. The user interface designer , design and make the actuly device from clay 4.. The marketing expert , prepare product evaluation for next meeting.

participant_decisions.sent: Engery source is going to be long term.
Custom chip to take atvanage of the voice recognition system.
. Interchangable cases to keep up with new fashions.
. the item will not have internal illumination.
The device will have 3 buttons, power on and channel up and down. and a slider wheel to adjust volume, which when pressed will bring up a menu screen for controlling further functions.

participant_problems.sent: No real problems, only issue were to decide final product specifications, and after discussion they were resolved.
